data.name: BELIEVE_TAB_01
data.value: They say that the signs to shape destiny could take upon 10 different forms. The scream for help has seen almost as much stars shaped as the once that should follow.

data.name: BELIEVE_TAB_02
data.value: They say that there are some abilities one may acquire that help them in all future trials.

data.name: BELIEVE_TAB_03
data.value: They say one should take a look a this room once they defy all odds.

data.name: BELIEVE_TAB_05
data.value: They say that the crowd falls more for those which don't need divine powers to bolster their might.

data.name: BELIEVE_TAB_06
data.value: They say the nobles carved hidden paths into the destiny.

data.name: BELIEVE_TAB_07
data.value: They say that there are {0} different powers one may obtain.

data.name: BELIEVE_TAB_08
data.value: They say certain powers may prevent others from appearing altogether.

data.name: BELIEVE_TAB_09
data.value: They say the misguided arrows are a sign from the higher beings.

data.name: BELIEVE_TAB_24
data.value: They say that the watchers pity the unlucky in their desperate hour.

data.name: BELIEVE_TAB_35
data.value: They say that the one keeping track hides a cryptic message at certain points. Although only the bravest warrior may be able to see the whole picture.

data.name: BELIEVE_TAB_36
data.value: They say there is only one power which cannot appear under normal circumstances.

data.name: BELIEVE_TAB_57
data.value: They say the instrument to inspect what many try to hide not only serves as a weapon and gathering essences.

data.name: LockedPrompt
data.value: The tablet is filled with many glyphs you can't decipher. But carved in the frame you can read the words "{0}".

data.name: Locked_BELIEVE_TAB_01
data.value: One of the common folk.

data.name: Locked_BELIEVE_TAB_02
data.value: Domination of a higher being (or its servant)

data.name: Locked_BELIEVE_TAB_03
data.value: More than 15000

data.name: Locked_BELIEVE_TAB_05
data.value: Faster than 1 hour

data.name: Locked_BELIEVE_TAB_06
data.value: Glory, even to a heretic

data.name: Locked_BELIEVE_TAB_07
data.value: Conquer the trial

data.name: Locked_BELIEVE_TAB_08
data.value: More than 5000

data.name: Locked_BELIEVE_TAB_09
data.value: More than 20000

data.name: Locked_BELIEVE_TAB_24
data.value: Conquer the grand trial

data.name: Locked_BELIEVE_TAB_35
data.value: Friend of the Grubs

data.name: Locked_BELIEVE_TAB_36
data.value: More than 10000

data.name: Locked_BELIEVE_TAB_57
data.value: Collector of ones dreams

data.name: Secret_BELIEVE_TAB_01
data.value: The scream vanquished into the amount of different artifacts the relic seeker may accept.

data.name: Secret_BELIEVE_TAB_02
data.value: It is said, that there are 4 of these…

data.name: Secret_BELIEVE_TAB_03
data.value: If you are reading this, you've proven not only your might with the nail.

data.name: Secret_BELIEVE_TAB_05
data.value: The crowd especially falls for gladiators which took upon the burden of pain.

data.name: Secret_BELIEVE_TAB_06
data.value: There are 6 bequest send out by the nobles.

data.name: Secret_BELIEVE_TAB_07
data.value: {0} of which are common, {1} are uncommon and {2} are rare.

data.name: Secret_BELIEVE_TAB_08
data.value: Despite the similarities it might resemble, "Void Heart" is not exiled while being under "Shining Bound".

data.name: Secret_BELIEVE_TAB_09
data.value: The arrows may appear at certain crossroads, but that information is trying to deceive you. Their position at the crossroads however...

data.name: Secret_BELIEVE_TAB_10
data.value: "Cull the Weak" increases the duration of "Root", the damage of "Burn" and "Bleed" and the power of "Concussion" and "Weakened".

data.name: Secret_BELIEVE_TAB_24
data.value: The gift shall lapse if one chooses any of the highest rank.

data.name: Secret_BELIEVE_TAB_36
data.value: The ones that kill their foes unscarred may succumb the tempation of said power…

data.name: Secret_BELIEVE_TAB_57
data.value: The lingering dreams left in the kingdom may open new paths.
